entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
